Mama Mia

Menukort

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {pizza} from "../pizza"; import { PizzaService } from '../pizza.service'; import {HttpService} from "../../services/http.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-pizzas', templateUrl: './pizzas.component.html', styleUrls: ['./pizzas.component.css'] }) export class PizzasComponent implements OnInit { pizzas: any; constructor(private pizzaService: PizzaService, private httpService: HttpService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getPizzas(); } async getPizzas() { this.pizzas = await this.httpService.getAllPizzas() } }
